SWE1-Requirements.label: REQ-0
SWE1-Requirements.description: Software shall be able to turn on and off a led

SWE1-Requirements.label: REQ-1
SWE1-Requirements.description: Software shall be able to communicate through a bus interface.

SWE1-Requirements.label: REQ-2
SWE1-Requirements.description: A bus communication protocol shall be defined in order to exchange data.

SWE1-Requirements.label: REQ-3
SWE1-Requirements.description: Brightness of the led shall be adjustable

SWE1-Requirements.label: REQ-4
SWE1-Requirements.description: Led color shall be selectable. Each component of the RGB is 8bits.

SWE1-Requirements.label: REQ-5
SWE1-Requirements.description: Led status shall be sent via the bus interface

SWE1-Requirements.label: REQ-6
SWE1-Requirements.description: Led shall be controllable through the bus interface (brightness, color, on/off).

SWE6-QualificationTests.label: QTEST-0
SWE6-QualificationTests.description:
Steps:
Send a command to turn the led red and 50% brightness via the bus protocol. 

Expected:
Check led is set correctly via the led status sent from the bus interface
